fineness noun [U]
(THIN QUALITY)
Add to word list

the quality of being very thin: It's the fineness of the thread that makes the cloth so soft.

fineness noun [U]
(EXACTNESS)
the quality of being very exact and delicate: When I look at her paintings I'm always struck by the fineness of the details.
